it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model

Class FactoryArena

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model.FactoryArena

  • public class FactoryArena
extends java.lang.Object
    It is a factory that produces an arena indicated by a code and the corresponding room list The Roomlist is a list that contains all the room in an arena The factory is static then it can be used without instantiate it Operation: 1)To use the method getArena to obtain the arena indicating the code and the Gameboard 2)After and only after the method get arena to has been used , to use the method getRooms to obtain the corresponding room list The factory can't be used in other way!!
    Author:
    Cysko7927

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Graph getArena(int code, GameBoard board)
      Creates the arena identified by a code unique(In the game there are four arenas possible)
      static java.util.List<Room> getRooms(GameBoard board)
      Creates a list of all room that they are in the arena created before by method getArena

    • Method Detail

      • getArena

        public static Graph getArena(int code,
                             GameBoard board)
                      throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                             java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Creates the arena identified by a code unique(In the game there are four arenas possible)
        Parameters:
        code - code unique that identifies a arena
        board - game board to whom the arena belongs
        Returns:
        arena created
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if board is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If code isn't between 1 and 4

      • getRooms

        public static java.util.List<Room> getRooms(GameBoard board)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                            java.lang.NullPointerException
        Creates a list of all room that they are in the arena created before by method getArena
        Parameters:
        board - board that will have to contain the rooms list
        Returns:
        list of rooms created
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If code used before by getArena isn't between 1 and 4
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If board is null or the method getArena has not yet been called
